Chikonzero (Chiko) Chazunguza bụ onye mba Zimbabwe na-ese ihe, onye na-eme ihe ike na onye nkuzi.
A mụrụ Chazunguza n'afọ 1967 na Harare, isi obodo Rhodesia
N'afọ 1987, o ritere akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ iji gụọ akwụkwọ na Higher Institute of Arts "Nikolay Pavlovich" na Sofia, Bulgaria, ebe o nwetara nzere masta nke nka
Na Bulgaria Chazunguza gụrụ ihe ndị a ma ama dị ka ibipụta akwụkwọ na eserese ma nọrọ afọ asaa na mba ahụ, na-ahụ ọdịda nke ọchịchị aka ike na mgbanwe ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya.

N'afọ 1994, ọ laghachiri Zimbabwe wee malite ịnwa ijikọta agụmakwụkwọ Europe ya na nka obodo Zimbabwe. Ọ nọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'ọtụtụ ngalaba dị iche iche, gụnyere ịkụzi nka ihe karịrị afọ iri na ise na mahadum na kọleji dị iche iche
Ọ bụ osote onye isi nke Zimbabwe Institute of Visual Arts na onye isi nke ngalaba nka na Harare Polytechnic
Chazunguza sonyere dị ka onye na-ekpe ikpe maka National Gallery of Zimbabwe na National Gallery of Namibia
Ọ haziri ọtụtụ nzukọ ọmụmụ ihe na mmemme ma bụrụ onye nduzi nka nke ọtụtụ obere ihe nkiri
N'otu oge ahụ, ọ na-arụ ọtụtụ ọrụ ọha na eze na Harare.
N'afọ 2015, Chazunguza, ya na Masimba Hwati na Gareth Nyandoro, nọchitere anya Zimbabwe na 56th International Art Exhibition nke Venice Biennale
Chazunguza enwetala ọtụtụ ihe nrite ma gosipụta ya n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi naanị ya na Africa, Europe na North America.
